Budō Lineage Tree

Ueshiba Morihei

植芝 盛平

JPN

* 1883 Tanabe Japan - † 1969 Iwama Japan

Open in tree ID page Source YAML

Teachers

  • Takeda Sōkaku -> Ueshiba Morihei 武田 惣角 (Daitō-ryū Aiki-jūjutsu)
  • Tozawa Tokusaburo -> Ueshiba Morihei 戸沢徳三郎 (Tenjin Shin'yō-ryū)
  • Masakatsu Naka -> Ueshiba Morihei 中井 正勝 (Yagyū Shingan-ryū)

Students

  • Ueshiba Morihei -> Tomiki Kenji 富木 謙治
  • Ueshiba Morihei -> Sugino Yoshio 杉野嘉男
  • Ueshiba Morihei -> Saitō Morihiro 斉藤 守弘
  • Ueshiba Morihei -> Mochizuki Minoru 望月 稔
  • Ueshiba Morihei -> Konishi Yasuhiro 小西康裕
  • Ueshiba Morihei -> Abbe Kenshirõ 阿部 謙四郎

Rank

  • Daitō-ryū Aiki-jūjutsu 大東流 合気柔術 : Kyōju Dairi ( Tozawa Tokusaburo )
  • Shuri-te 首里手 : Shoden ( Tozawa Tokusaburo )
